name: 2018/11/20 Lunch
description: This lunch menu, tagged as high-protein, high-sugar, high-fiber, Healthyfied, and Healthified Recipes, promises a nourishing and revitalizing meal. It's perfectly balanced with a garden salad topped with turkey for your protein needs, a sweet tangerine for a dose of healthy sugars, a banana packed with fiber, and a juicy quarter of rotisserie chicken to keep you satisfied and energized throughout the day.
recipeIngredient: 1 -1/3 oz portion, Garden Salad with Turkey

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the garden salad as per your preference or follow a basic salad recipe. Add the turkey portion on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the tangerine and segment it. Set aside for serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the banana and place it on your serving dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the rotisserie chicken quarter in the oven at 350Â°F for 10-15 minutes, until heated through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the salad, tangerine segments, banana, and warm chicken quarter on a plate and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
